snippet.title: GRACEBORNE - Alpha Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Graceborne is a mod overhaul for Elden Ring, heavily inspired by Bloodborne, with the main goal of changing the mood and tone to a much more dark and sinister atmosphere. 
It adds a total of 22 armor sets, 35 weapons, 17 trick weapons and 5 firearms. Followed by gameplay additions such as gun parrying, no equip load, quicksteps when locked on, perma-night, etc. It also replaces the appearance of several mobs and bosses to fit in the aesthetic of the overhaul.
.
Try it out here (you need to downgrade the game to 1.10)
https://www.nexusmods.com/eldenring/mods/5207
.
Supporting my Patreon helps me a ton - https://www.patreon.com/corvianNoctis
.
Join my Discord Server to get updates and more - https://discord.gg/HEmwea7BhH
.
#eldenring #eldenringmod #eldenringgameplay #bloodborne #soulsborne #modding #moddinggames #graceborne
